title: Now that we have Sett, I want a manga inspired skin series.
body:
because KONO DIO DA.

I mean, take some champs maybe call it "comic book _______" whatever, and make it different, but clear manga references.

Like Sett based on Dio.
Galio based on Almight.

I mean, I'd buy it. Embrace your inner weeb. You know you want to.  ;D

replies.body: Instead of a new skin line, they could also just put him into Battle Academia.

> [{quoted}](name=Chembaron Yamada,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XyQ9I3pX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-27T11:26:25.299+0000)
>
> Instead of a new skin line, they could also just put him into Battle Academia.

this is already in development lol.

No.
This is a horrible idea and you should feel bad. This game already caters to weebs like crazy!
The fact that you even brang this up scares me, because Riot is so uncreative and lazy that i actually believe they would steal character designs from popular animes and make skins out of them!
I mean, they already referenced JoJo's in Sett's champion spotlight, pretty sure this idea is not new for Riot.

They missed their chance to make Mecha Kingdoms Sett turn into a steamroller when he ults like how Sion turns into a train.

There's still the possibility of a Mecha Sett in the future that does this though I guess.
